箱中气候.encontent:
Clouds help predict the weather, and also affect the
 air humidity ...  Oh, my wine!
箱中气候.content:
云朵对于天气预报有辅助作用，同时也会影响空气湿度……噢
，我的酒！

致未来.encontent:
People are infatuated with time, chasing after immortality.
 That's the thing that never changes ...  It's the
 motivation, also the limitation.
致未来.content:
人们迷恋时间，追求永生。自古至今，恒常不变……这是
动力，亦是限制。

孑立.encontent: Just like Cézanne's The Kitchen Table, Balthus' Still Life with a Figure ... Well, I think Caravaggio's Basket of Fruit is better.
孑立.content:
就像塞尚《厨房的桌子》，或是巴尔蒂斯的《静物》……好
吧，我想卡拉瓦乔的《一篮水果》更合适些。

问候.encontent:
Are you here to confirm this APPLe's expiration date?
 Don't worry!
问候.content: 你来确认APPLe某的保质期吗？不必担心～

朝晨.encontent:
An apple a day keeps the doctor away. However, please
 do not count on this APPLe, will you? My friend.
朝晨.content:
每天一苹果，医生远离你。但别希望我为你赶走医生，好
吗？我的朋友。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
The light particles traveling from one medium to a
 different medium in a parallel direction ...  Um,
 hi ... good morning.
信任-朝晨.content:
光微粒在两种介质界面处受到的力在平行方向上被……呃
，嗨……早上好。

夜暮.encontent:
When the side of the earth turns away form the sun,
 people call it night ...  While in fact, everything
 stays the same and nothing changes.
夜暮.content:
当地球背对太阳，人们将其称之为黑夜……可实际上一切
都是最初的样子，什么也没有改变。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Hello, Ms. Vertin ... sssssss ... W-When did you, burp,
 master my ... optical arcane skill? But I-I don't
 see ... any sunlight in here?
信任-夜暮.content:
维尔汀小姐——们，你也领悟了光、光学的折射技巧么？……可
是我没有见到、太阳呀？！

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Apples will drop when they're ripe ...  Umm, why am
 I saying these?
帽檐与发鬓.content: 苹果成熟后会自然落……唔，我为什么要说这些？

袖与手.encontent:
What are you looking for? I think I ... may not be
 of help.
袖与手.content: 你在寻找什么？我想我……应该帮不上忙吧。

衣着与身形.encontent:
I am not heavy ...  since I have to consider the force
 that the people sitting under the tree can withstand.
衣着与身形.content:
我的体重并不重。——毕竟，我需要考虑树下人们的颅骨
承受力。

嗜好.encontent:
Alcohol can sterilize, disinfect and innerve ... I
 mean, Sherry is pretty good.
嗜好.content:
酒精能够杀菌、消毒，让神经亢奋……嗝，雪利酒就很不
错。

赞赏.encontent: You've read through The basic study of alchemy?How about Theoretical system of nature philosophy? And The trajectories of the planets? ... You may now be able to discuss more things with this APPLe!
赞赏.content:
《炼金术的基础研究》已经通读了？《自然哲学的理论体
系》呢？《行星的运动轨迹》？……或许你能与APPLe某
讨论更多相关的东西了！

亲昵.encontent:
About the study of fission and enrichment of the tungsten
 powder in displacement reaction, this APPLe considers
 you as the perfect assistant.
亲昵.content:
关于“钨尘在金属置换反应中的裂变与集聚”的相关研究
课题，APPLe某认为你是非常合适的协助对象。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Waffle! Ugh, please don't misunderstand me. It's just
 a little admonition for this APPLe himself ...  Haven't
 the posts on this forum been checked?!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
胡扯！呃，别误会，只是APPLe某对自己的小小训诫
……这个论坛的文章难道没有经过审核么？！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
I heard that there is a medieval knight wandering around. May
 I have a look at him ... or his armor? ... Maybe we can talk
 about wines in the Loire region.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
听说有一名中世纪骑士在四处游荡，我能见见他的铠甲么
？……也许我们能聊聊卢瓦尔河地区的葡萄酒。

独白.encontent:
The shattered memories from the past sometimes haunt
 me ...  I see the revoluting celestial bodies faraway,giant
 telescope and rainbow lights ...
独白.content:
关于过去的零碎记忆时常扰乱着我……我总能看到那些遥
远的运转着的天体，巨大的望远镜，一道道彩虹光……

入队.encontent:
Hmm ... there will be some differences between theory
 and practice.
入队.content: 唔……实践与理论存在着一定的偏差。

战前.encontent: You can't see me, you can't see me ...

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Don't worry. Weightlessness only lasts a second.
择选至终的仪式.content: 别担心，失重只有短短的一瞬间。

释放神秘术Ⅰ.content: 白色？亦或者是所有颜色？

释放神秘术Ⅱ.encontent: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
释放神秘术Ⅱ.content: 每天一苹果，医生远离你。

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
The star falls towards the sun, as the apple drops
 to the ground.
召唤至终的仪式.content: 星球坠向太阳，正如苹果从树枝落下。

战斗胜利.encontent: Which matters more, knowledge or strength?
战斗胜利.content: 智慧与力量，到底哪一个更重要？

洞悉.encontent:
Marvelous ...  If possible, may this APPLe have one
 more please? This APPLe thinks there is still room
 for formula improvement.
洞悉.content:
奇妙的感觉……如果方便的话，能再给APPLe某一份
相同的原料么？APPLe某认为此配方仍有精进的空间
。

洞悉之底.encontent:
If I have seen further, it is by standing on the table
 ...
洞悉之底.content: 我能看得更远，因为我站在了桌子上……
